thread.title: Watch Adorable Hamsters Recreate the Friends Opening Credits
thread.title_full: Watch Adorable Hamsters Recreate the Friends Opening Credits

author: Sadie Gennis, TV GUIDE
title: Watch Adorable Hamsters Recreate the Friends Opening Credits
text:
Watch Adorable Hamsters Recreate the Friends Opening Credits 1 / 1 Back to Gallery 
How do you make one of the greatest sitcoms of all time even better? Add hamsters! 
That's what Mashable did when they recreated Friends ' iconic opening credits starring a gang of adorable (and adoptable!) hamsters and David Schwimmer , whom you cannot adopt. 
So how does Jennifer Hamsterston's style compare to the real deal? What would Gunther say if he saw his favorite customers nibbling on the decor? And could this video be any cuter? 
All important questions you can answer after you watch the video below. Most Popular
